input.sentences: the board meets and discusses today 's agenda .
the leader prepares to give a speech .
the leader gives a speech about today 's agenda .
their is a followup with another speaker .

output.sentences: The board meeting got started once everyone was there.
They started by bringing up the first topic on the agenda.
The president gave his views on the topic.
Another speaker had time to give his views also.
After that, the president took some student questions.
